response.answer_text: Yes, very. They’re so rude that they’re literally the definition of rude. Like I can write an entire book series of why I think they’re rude and why I hate them so much. They have no manners at all and it’s just unacceptable! R- Really effing talented U- Unique voices D- Damn, they are beautiful E- Every member is important But seriously… They’re honestly so impolite.  God, look at how Jisoo got angry at her manager? She’s so disrespectful, but cute?What even?!  Why is Jennie smiling for no reason? Can we all just give an uwu for this?  Rosé is abusing that poor apple slice. But even her eating is adorable? RIP apple.  Now Lisa is just plain mean! She’s making fun of camels, that’s not okay! Like she is such a cutie, it’s not fair! - In conclusion, the BLACKPINK members are so ruthless to my poor little heart T-T  Edit: I wrote this answer back in November 2019 and I’m still getting comments like “OMG I hate you, why would you call BP rude?” and “BP isn’t rude at all!”. This whole post was a joke to begin with. I literally made up an acronym for the word “rude” which should be more than enough to say that I was trolling the OP that asked the question. I even made little comments under every picture and GIF, joking about how rude they were, but THEN contradicting my previous comments by calling the members cute. And then, I wrote about how the BP members were ruthless to my heart, meaning that I couldn’t handle their cuteness. If that all wasn’t enough to tell you I was joking, I really don’t know what to say. Some of you even have the audacity to call me names and write hate comments when you could’ve took a few seconds to read some of the other people’s comments where they were all playing along with me, knowing full well I was making fun of the OP.

No, stop trying to find anything bad about blackpink because they are popular. They aren’t rude to anyone.   Although Jennie has a rbf so she may look cold sometimes doesn’t mean she’s rude. Jennie has been called the rudest member for some time. Behind that cold looking face is a sweet girl.  A girl who put her fans over her  a girl who have her hairpin to an anti  a girl who gave her towel to fan that looked like they were gonna faint  A girl who takes gifts from her fans even though she could get in trouble for it  A girl who turned her fan to a fan who looked hot  A girl who spent her money to give her fans scented candles, cafe gift cards, and slogans  a girl, who despite being bullied her whole career never stood up for herself, only her members  a girl who paid over 30k of her own money for a truck and gave Korean blinks gifts from Hera and lunches  A girl who prepared face masks, hot packs, and photo cards for blinks attending music core  a girl who donates supplies, food, and medicine to animal shelters   Please don’t judge a book by it’s cover. Of course all of the other members are sweet and not rude, but Jennie gets called rude the most when in fact, she’s probably the sweetest member. That’s saying something because of how sweet and caring all of the members are. Don’t forget Jennie is a human too. She has never done anything rude. She goes out of her way to be kind and care for blinks and her members.  Not to mention blackpink got together and donated 40 million won to the victims of the Gangwon fire. All of the members are kind and caring. They have a girl crush concept, yes. They sometimes look rude, yes. But they are the sweetest, most caring people ever.
